message.content:
cs.LG, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.AI, cs.DS

This paper deals with the challenges of training machine learning models over distributed networks of devices, which is a common topic in the field of machine learning. The paper proposes a novel optimization method that is robust to practical systems issues, which suggests that it may fall under the category of machine learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper deals with issues of high communication cost, stragglers, and fault tolerance, which are common issues in distributed computing (cs.DC) and control systems (cs.SY). The paper also proposes a method for multi-task learning, which is a subfield of machine learning (cs.AI) and statistics (cs.DS). Therefore, the most likely categories for this paper are cs.LG, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.AI, and cs.DS, in that order.
